pages.text: Money is a valuable resource in Factory Builder. It allows you to buy resources and machines for your factory.

A wallet is used to store money which you can then use in the $(l:intro/shop)Admin Shop$(), to do this make sure your wallet is equipped in your Curios Slot (little cross next to player head when in inventory). To access your Wallet, press the "O" key by default. Wallets can only store up to a certain amount of money, this Basic Wallet only stores up to 1,000 in cash! You can get better wallets in the future don't worry!
